pure interface of class zeta.content.zirp.Predicate

The documentated page. 
public class Predicate
  extends AnnotatedTerm
{
    public case Schema(Expr schema);
    public case Test(Expr elem,
                     Expr set);
    public case Fact(FactKind kind);
    public static class FactKind
      extends Term
    public case Unary(UnaryKind kind,
                      Predicate oper);
    public static class UnaryKind
      extends Term
    public static class ConstrRef
      extends Term
    public case Binary(BinaryKind kind,
                       Predicate left,
                       Predicate right);
    public static class BinaryKind
      extends Term
    public case Quantor(QuantorKind kind,
                        Expr matrix,
                        Predicate range);
    public static class QuantorKind
      extends Term
}
